    • mergeAsync

      <T> CompletableFuture<T> mergeAsync(T object)
      Helper method to merge a detached entity into a managed entity and flush async.
      Parameters:
      object - entity to update
      Returns:
      a future that will be completed when this action is done and returns the managed entity.

    • queryBuilderAsync

      CompletableFuture<Void> queryBuilderAsync(BiConsumer<jakarta.persistence.EntityManager,jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder> consumer)
      Helper method to build and execute a query for a new session async.
      Parameters:
      consumer - consumer that will build and execute the query
      Returns:
      a future that will be completed when the query is done

    • queryBuilderAsync

      <T> CompletableFuture<T> queryBuilderAsync(BiFunction<jakarta.persistence.EntityManager,jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder,T> func)
      Helper method to build and execute a query for a new session async.
      Parameters:
      func - function that will build and execute the query and return the result
      Returns:
      a future that will be completed with the result when the query is done

    • findAllAsync

      <T> CompletableFuture<List<T>> findAllAsync(Class<T> entityType, JpaDatabaseContext.FindAllModifier<T> modifier)
      Helper method to find all entities of a given entity class async with the ability to refine the selection.
      Parameters:
      entityType - entity class
      modifier - function that will modify the query
      Returns:
      a future that will be completed with the list of entities

      Helper method to find all entities of a given entity class async with a where clause.

      entityType - entity class
      modifier - function that create the where clause

      a future that will be completed with the list of entities
